sentences.sentence: He ended up hunkering down beside her.
sentences.translation: 他最终在她身边蹲了下来。

sentences.sentence: Suzuki said last month that it was cancelling plans to build a Russian factory, but most foreign firms are hunkering down and waiting for an upturn.
sentences.translation: 上个月铃木说，他们取消了再俄罗斯建厂的计划，但是大部分的外国公司在在静待好转和一个回暖。

sentences.sentence: Hunkering down will only make you less influential and so less effective.
sentences.translation: 独善其身只会降低管理者的影响力和效率。
